title: Aadu Puli
overview: Aadu Puli is a 2011 Indian Tamil masalaâ€“action film written and directed by newcomer Vijay Prakash. Starring Aadhi, Poorna, Prabhu Ganesan and Suresh, the film released on 18 February 2011. The film opened to negative reviews and was an Average Grosser at the Box office.
